question: What new designation did Bath receive in 2021 related to UNESCO?
true_answer: Included in the "Great Spa Towns of Europe"
asked_question_translated: Sebutan baru apa yang diterima Bath pada tahun 2021 terkait dengan UNESCO?
answer: Pada tahun 2021, Bath menerima status "Great Spa Towns of Europe" dari UNESCO.
answer_translated_eng: In 2021, Bath received the status of "Great Spa Towns of Europe" from UNESCO.
